title: When your adc is Flaming you.
body:
http://38.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m5h3fqOZoj1qj7ct2o1_500.gif
And you start roaming because of it.

replies.body:
I'm kinda curious by now: 
Do you have by any chance the "Giant Enemy Crabgot" skin?
No, But i should probably get it.

When your support flames you and they go top because we're getting pushed out of lane hard and they expect ADC to defend tower alone. 

Aint gonna happen.
_____________________________________

This sad relationship goes both ways when it comes to abuse.
